metadata.title: CVE-2015-8685 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities in Dolibarr ERP/CRM3.8.3 and earlier allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script orHTML via the (1) external calendar url or (2) the bank name field in the"import external calendar" page.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8685` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dolibarr - 3.5.8+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dolibarr package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.8+dfsg1-1').
